channel.title: Pk Zone Help
channel.description:
How do I make 1v1 zone in Delta, I switched to delta the other day so, I have been using Czar,
Delta rocks though
Also how do I make Rune Crossbow hit 40+'s because I changed Str bonus and range bonus for both bolts and Crossbow but it doesn't work.

item.title: Pk Zone Help
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

this is what to do
search for
Code:

    if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837))

there should be a code saying 1.25D or something
raise the 1.25 (dont mess with the D)

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Zone Help
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

For the Crossbow All You have to do is change the Range Bonus In Item.cfg

Read full topic
